00046 void pizItemset1024SetAtIndex (PIZItemset1024 *itemset, long index)
00047 {
00048     long i, p, m;
00049     
00050     i = index / PIZ_ITEMSET1024_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00051     p = index % PIZ_ITEMSET1024_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00052     
00053     m = 1 << p;
00054     
00055     itemset->items[i] |= m;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void pizItemset1024UnsetAtIndex (PIZItemset1024 *itemset, long index) 
00059 {
00060     long i, p, m;
00061     
00062     i = index / PIZ_ITEMSET1024_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00063     p = index % PIZ_ITEMSET1024_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00064     
00065     m = 1 << p;
00066     
00067     itemset->items[i] &= ~m;
00068 }
00069     
00070 void pizItemset1024Clear (PIZItemset1024 *itemset)  
00071 {
00072     long i;
00073     
00074     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET1024_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00075             itemset->items[i] = 0;
00076         }
00077 }
00078     
00079 long pizItemset1024Count (const PIZItemset1024 *itemset)
00080 {
00081     long i;
00082     long k = 0;
00083     
00084     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET1024_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++)
00085         {
00086             unsigned long n = itemset->items[i];
00087             
00088             while (n != 0) {
00089                     k  += (n & 1);
00090                     n >>= 1;
00091                 }
00092         }
00093     
00094     return k;
00095 }
00096 
00097 bool pizItemset1024IsSetAtIndex (const PIZItemset1024 *itemset, long index) 
00098 {
00099     unsigned long k = 0;
00100 
00101     long i, p;
00102 
00103     i = index / PIZ_ITEMSET1024_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00104     p = index % PIZ_ITEMSET1024_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00105     
00106     k = itemset->items[i];
00107 
00108     k >>= p;
00109     k  &= 1;
00110     
00111     return (k != 0);
00112 }
00113 
00114 void pizItemset1024Union (const PIZItemset1024 *a, const PIZItemset1024 *b, PIZItemset1024 *r) 
00115 {
00116     long i;
00117     
00118     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET1024_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00119             r->items[i] = a->items[i] | b->items[i];
00120         }
00121 }
00122 
00123 void pizItemset1024Intersection (const PIZItemset1024 *a, const PIZItemset1024 *b, PIZItemset1024 *r) 
00124 {
00125     long i;
00126     
00127     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET1024_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00128             r->items[i] = a->items[i] & b->items[i];
00129         }
00130 }
00131 
00132 bool pizItemset1024IsIncluded (const PIZItemset1024 *a, const PIZItemset1024 *b)
00133 {
00134     long i;
00135     bool k = true;
00136             
00137     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET1024_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++)
00138         {
00139             if (b->items[i] != (b->items[i] | a->items[i])) {
00140                     k = false;
00141                     break;
00142                 }
00143         }
00144         
00145     return k;
00146 }
00147 
00148 bool pizItemset1024IsEqual (const PIZItemset1024 *a, const PIZItemset1024 *b)
00149 {
00150     long i;
00151     long k = true;
00152             
00153     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET1024_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++)
00154         {
00155             if (a->items[i] != b->items[i]) {
00156                     k = false;
00157                     break;
00158                 }
00159         }
00160         
00161     return k;
00162 }
